lines.text: So I know it looks like he bled out, but...
What if this is all a setup? Like, someone cast Flesh to Stone on him, and...
...and then painted the statue to look real! And spilled paint everywhere to look like blood!
I'm... I'm pretty sure that's not it.
I've inspected the body, and his flesh was... yielding.
A-ah! N-no, I... I just poked... I didn't disturb the...
Disturb the- oh! You mean, like the no-touching-stuff rule.
M-my apologies. It- it shouldn't affect the investigation.
Yeaaaah, I don't really care about that. I was just gonna make a double entendre about ''inspecting the body'', y'know?
Way to ruin the joke, Opal.
